page.title: 20WORDS ABOUT FARMING
page.content:
{SLURRY 1 THIS IS COW MUCK MIXED WITH COWS WATER. WHEN THE COWS ARE IN THE CUBICLES IN WINTER THEY HAVE TO BE MUCKED OUT TWICE A DAY WITH EITHER A TRACTOR SCRAPER OR A HAND SCRAPER. THE MUCK GOES DOWN THE SHOOTS AND INTO THE MUCK SPREADER. AND THEN DAD TAKES IT ONTO THE FIELD. MY UNCLE SAYS YOU ONLY PUT A SNIFF OF FERT ON THE FIELDS OR ELSE IT WILL BURN THE GRASS.
{MIDDEN A MIDDEN HAS THREE SIDES ONE BACK AND TWO SIDES, AND THE FRONT HAS AN OPENING WHICH THE TRACTOR GOES INTO. WHEN THE MIDDEN IS ABOUT HALF FULL THE MUCK IS LOADED AND TAKEN OUT ONTO THE FIELDS.
